mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tus_user ( username VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY , password VARCHAR(255) , email VARCHAR(255) , reg_date TIMESTAMP , mod_date TIMESTAMP , last_login TIMESTAMP , account_non_expired BOOLEAN , account_non_locked BOOLEAN , credentials_non_expired BOOLEAN , enabled BOOLEAN ); CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_user_email ON tus_user (email);
mapper.select: SELECT username , password , email , mod_date modDate , reg_date regDate , last_login lastLogin , account_non_expired accountNonExpired , account_non_locked accountNonLocked , credentials_non_expired credentialsNonExpired , enabled FROM tus_user WHERE username = #{username}
